ingredients.ingredient: 20 miniature chocolate covered peanut butter cups, unwrapped

cookingTips: Unwrap peanut butter cups before adding to batter to improve appearance
Press cups into batter after spreading to ensure they stay submerged during baking
Bake until a toothpick inserted in brownie (not cup) comes out barely moist
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how to use convenience products while still achieving special homemade results.
